Instruction: Wash and dry the mixed greens.
Slice the avocado and red onion.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, blueberries, sliced avocado, sliced red onion, toasted almonds, and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Serve immediately as a refreshing side salad.
